sources: D:/DOT WEB CODE/06 REACT/03 React Advance/04 Shoping-cart Project using Redux/src/components/Product.js
sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' const Product = ({post}) => { const {cart} = useSelector((state) => state); return (

{post.title}

{post.description}

{post.price}

{ cart.some((p) => p.id == post.id) }
) } export default Product
